Name: cobalt_ineligible_content
clcommon__Content__c:
What is an Ineligible Business?

For the purposes of Business Account Opening and risk mitigation, Thrive Financial does not allow specific businesses or business activities to open business accounts. The following business types are not eligible to open accounts online:

  • Check cashing
  • Credit/Debit repair
  • Gambling
  • Marijuana-related businesses
  • Mortgage lending
  • Non-US based businesses
  • Payday lending
  • Psychic services
  • Telemarketing
  • Timeshare services
